name: Grid Runner (itch)
description:
This project was almost finished when I decided to take it in a different direction. After that, it was thrown into development Limbo. Maybe someday I'll pull it out of there and work on the features I want to implement. But until that day, feel free to try it out :)

Note: I was planning it for mobile, so controls are by swiping the screen with your mouse. Swipe left and right to turn (and change lanes), swipe up to jump and swipe down to duck.
